title: Insolvency of employer not to release insurance carrier
context: ยง386-126 Insolvency of employer not to release insurance carrier. Every policy and contract shall contain a provision to the effect that the insolvency or bankruptcy of the employer and the employer&rsquo;s discharge therein shall not relieve the insurance carrier from the payment of compensation for an injury suffered by a covered employee during the life of the policy or contract. [L 1963, c 116, pt of ยง1; Supp, ยง97-125; HRS ยง386-126; gen ch 1985]
